IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO MAINTAIN AND PROMOTE CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS THROUGHOUT THE USA AND PARTICULARLY WITHIN THE STATE OF CT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE FREEDOMS OF SPEECH, PRESS, ASSOCIATION AND RELIGION; THE RIGHTS TO DUE PROCESS OF LAW, AND TO EQUAL PROTECTION OF LAW.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO MAINTAIN AND PROMOTE CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS THROUGHOUT THE USA AND PARTICULARLY WITHIN THE STATE OF CT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE FREEDOMS OF SPEECH, PRESS, ASSOCIATION AND RELIGION; THE RIGHTS TO DUE PROCESS OF LAW, AND TO EQUAL PROTECTION OF LAW.
IRS990.Desc: TO MAINTAIN AND PROMOTE CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL, LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS THROUGH LEGISLATIVE AND ADVOCACY, GRASSROOTS ORGANIZING AND PUBLIC EDUCATION ON A BROAD ARRAY OF ISSUES AFFECTING THE CIVIL LIBERTIES OF THOSE IN THE STATE OF CT.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: TO ADVANCE CIVIL RIGHTS AND LIBERTIES BY BUILDING THE NECESSARY RELATIONSHIPS, PUBLIC AWARENESS, PUBLIC NARRATIVES, AND PRESSURE FELT BY POLITICIANS IN ORDER TO BUILD THE POLITICAL POWER OF PEOPLE DIRECTLY IMPACTED BY CIVIL RIGHTS AND LIBERTIES ISSUES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS JOIN BY PAYING DUES TO THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEW FORM 990 IN DETAIL PRIOR TO FILLING AND COMPLETE COPY IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD AFTER THE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES THAT ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD READ, UNDERSTAND AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 15A- COMPENSATION PROCESS FOR TOP OFFICIAL: THE BOARD REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION THROUGH THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE RECOMMENDATIONS. 15B-COMPENSATION PROCESS FOR KEY OFFICIAL: THE BOARD REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION THROUGH THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE RECOMMENDATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE FILED WITH THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT AND ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
EMPLOYEES' EARNINGS ARE REPORTED ON FORMS W-2 OF THE AMERICAN CIVIL LIBERTIES UNION FOUNDATION OF CONNECTICUT, INC. UNDER FEDERAL ID: 06-0871754.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE R, PART II - AMERICAN CIVIL LIBERTIES UNION FOUNDATION OF CT, INC.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AMERICAN CIVIL LIBERTIES UION FOUNDATION OF CONNECTICUT, INC. IS REALTED BY A COMMON BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS. THE ORGANIZATION SHARE OFFICE SPACE, EMPLOYEES AND RELATED EXPENSES.
